in.co.rays.proj0.service

Class CollegeServiceSpringImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.co.rays.proj0.service.CollegeServiceSpringImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollegeServiceInt

    @Service(value="collegeService")
public class CollegeServiceSpringImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements CollegeServiceInt
    Session facade of College Service. It is transactional, apply delcarative transactions with help of Spring AOP. If unchecked exception is propagated from a method then transaction will be rolled back. Default propogation value is Propagation.REQUIRED and readOnly = false
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    DAO
